mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM am_action WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT 1

SELECT project.project_name AS projectName, IFNULL(sum(t.action_count), 0) AS actionCount FROM am_project project LEFT JOIN ( SELECT module.project_id, module.id, IFNULL(module_action.action_count,0) AS action_count FROM am_module module LEFT JOIN ( SELECT module_id, count(module_id) AS action_count FROM am_action GROUP BY module_id ) module_action ON module.id = module_action.module_id ) t ON project.id = t.project_id GROUP BY project.id;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO am_action
id,
module_id,
project_id,
dep_id,
content_type,
action_name,
action_desc,
request_type,
domain_id,
request_url,
status,
action_level,
test_group_id,
request_head_definition,
request_definition,
query_definition,
response_definition,
response_fail_definition,
request_head_mock,
request_mock,
response_mock,
create_user,
create_time,
update_user,
update_time
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{contentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{actionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
UPDATE am_action
module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
action_name = #{actionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
action_desc = #{actionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_type = #{requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
request_url = #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
action_level = #{actionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
test_group_id = #{testGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
request_head_definition = #{requestHeadDefinition,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
request_definition = #{requestDefinition,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
query_definition = #{queryDefinition,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
response_definition = #{responseDefinition,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
response_fail_definition = #{responseFailDefinition,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
request_head_mock = #{requestHeadMock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_mock = #{requestMock,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
response_mock = #{responseMock,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
